title: Why is the left hand jealous of the right hand? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, for a leftie, left hand can feel sad for right hand :( Because he has much difficulty moving and usually just holds things tightly when the arm and chest do much of the work whenever some methodological or repetitive task is to be done. Whereas, the left hand is out there moving and exploring and having adventures.
Left hand is bored with his life. Right hand is always out there working. Also left hand feels like Noone really needs him at times. It's all in his head(palm)
